messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 98
messages.msgSnippet: Sharon, We would love to come visit. At unschooling.com we tried to coordinate a big camp out in St. Marks but everyone bailed out at the last minute. So one
messages.messageBody:
Sharon,
We would love to come visit. At unschooling.com we tried to coordinate a big
camp out in St. Marks but everyone bailed out at the last minute. So one
family drove here to P'cola and another family that lives here and my family
had our own little get together.
It was a lot of fun!
I would love to meet more of the FL unschoolers though, there are really
quite a few of us spread out.
It will depend on work mainly.....money shouldn't be much of a problem if we
camp.

Meghan, I'll send you the link for the homeschool registry after I get off of
this board.
There are about 7 families listed for my town, you never know who you'll find
there. And it conveniently asks you to list your homeschool "style" so it's
easy to find unschoolers if there are any in your area.
There is a thread at unschooling.com for each state also...did you check that?
Ren
